task.title: Create a New Project
task.shortdesc: Procedure for creating a new Project.

step.cmd: Log into the Helion CICD tool and begin.

choices.choice: If there are no projects, click New Project.
If some projects have already been created, click Projects at the top of the page and then click New Project.

step.cmd: Click to select your Git source.

choices.choice: Use GitHub: Connect to a repository hosted on GitHub .
Use Git: Connect to a repository hosted locally.

step.cmd: Click a repository in the list to select it.

choices.choice: Branch: Select the branch containing the code to build.
Environment: Select the target environment to deploy to. If the target environment has not yet been created, click Create New Environment.
Project Type: Select the appropriate development language.
Project Name: Enter a name for this project. (any restrictions? long/short/unique/special chars?)
